nodes.text: Arno Gallorr was a mechanic who lived in the town of Corestrike on Chrona. He was the son of Mortris Gallorr, and was married to Serise with whom he had a child, Selmar. Alongside his father, Gallorr was a member of the town's Magistrate Council, although he had been threatened into abstaining from all votes by the local criminal, Themog.
